headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: The Fourth in America. Aired 10-11p ET

utterances.speaker: BORIS SANCHEZ, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: How low can you go, how low can you go? Dana Bash, do you like Ludicrous?

utterances.speaker: DANA BASH, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Yes, I just want to keep hearing it. I wasn't going to interrupt that.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: We've got two very exciting chose to bring you right now. Rapper, singer, and songwriter Post Malone is performing in Napa, California, and for the first time on CNN's Fourth in America, fireworks over Niagara Falls.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: I was so inspired by Post Malone, I decided to get a face tat of my own. Here, it's a thing that has been done at CNN holiday extravaganzas before people getting tattoos.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: On their face?

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Well, maybe a first for the 4th.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Are we getting a close-up of that?

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: You like that? You like that?

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Yes. I mean, it works.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: I just want to take a second and say I love the 4th of July in part, Dana, because I'm here, largely because of choice. My grandfather was a political prisoner in Cuba. And coming to this country, being embraced by this country and now being able to celebrate alongside great people like you, it's something special. So, the 4th means a lot to me and I'm glad I get to share it with all of you.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Absolutely, that is so nice, so, so nice. And I'm glad you shared that story.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: You're looking at live pictures from Nashville, home to one of the hottest Independence Day parties. We're bringing you fireworks from the music city and a performance by country music great Brad Paisley. And it's all coming up on the 4th in America, rather.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: We take a look at the fourth of July party in Nashville, Tennessee. A huge crowd gathered in the Music City for a dazzling fireworks display as well as the music of Country Superstar Brad Paisley. We're bringing you both shows tonight and later, the celebration is going to move west with fireworks from California, including San Diego's famous Big Bay Boom extravaganza. You do not want to miss that.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Can you say that three times?

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Big Bay Boom. Big Bay Boom. Big Bay Boom. Dana, we also have some friends joining us from San Diego.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: I bet they can do it three times fast. Hi, it's Victor Blackwell and Cari Champion.CARI CHAMPION, HOST, "THE CARI CHAMPION SHOW": Try it.

utterances.speaker: VICTOR BLACKWELL, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: And Happy Fourth of July to both of you.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Happy Fourth of July!

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Happy Fourth! Listen, you all have had some great shows.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Okay.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You had D.C., you had New York. But come on, look at this.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah, our weather. You can't beat our weather.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: I know.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Look at this backdrop. Boats are behind us at the bay. It's amazing.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: This is beautiful. So, we're standing here on a pier in San Diego Bay and the weather, I mean, we're on opposite ends of the spectrum. You guys there in D.C. are in the 90s. We're here in the 60s, but there are families here. They've got the chairs out on the seawall. It's beautiful.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It's the best resort town there is, I think. I live in Southern California. I think this is the best resort town. Coronado, where we are right now, to me, really represents what we're doing today. There are families and their friends, and they're just getting here and celebrating the fourth of July.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And we coordinated. Look at us.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: We actually -- we put this together.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: I know. That's impressive, guys.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: That incredible view behind you is only matched by how stunning --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Great show is coming up --

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: --and stylish you all look, right?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Thank you, Boris. BASH

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Of course.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: All right, we are closing in on the Nashville fireworks and a performance by Country Music Star Brad Paisley. Let's go live to CNN's Nick Valencia in Music City. Nick, set the scene for us.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Okay, we're excited too, but fact check, you are not a bad day guy.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: No, definitely not. Definitely not. Nick, always a jovial personality. Always a big smile on that face. Nick Valencia, enjoy that party. We're going to get to it in a moment. But first, let's go to Coi Leray because she's coming to us from summer fest in Milwaukee where the festival is celebrating its 55th anniversary.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Coi Leray along with some spectacular fireworks from Boston where it all started.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: That's right.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Take a look at these fireworks in Boston, a city that originated fireworks on the fourth of July. The spectacular show continues live on CNN.
